org.hl7.meta
Interface XmlIts

public interface XmlIts

Provides XML ITS specific functionality; as opposed to generic metadata.

Author:
Jerry Joyce

Method Summary
 void foldGeneralizations(MessageType messageType)
          Folds all classes in a message type.
 void foldGeneralizations(MessageType messageType, CloneClass cloneClass)
          If the current class contains any associations with non-null choiceSet, traverses all associations of RIM type 'generalizes' and folds them into a single class.
 Feature lookupMetadataByTag(CloneClass cloneClass, java.lang.String tag)
          Looks up metadata for a linked clone class or nested datatype, based on XML tag name.
 

Method Detail

lookupMetadataByTag

Feature lookupMetadataByTag(CloneClass cloneClass,
                            java.lang.String tag)
Looks up metadata for a linked clone class or nested datatype, based on XML tag name. Really belongs in XML ITS class.

Parameters:
cloneClass - parent clone class to start from
tag - XML tag to look up
Returns:
metadata found, or null if not found

foldGeneralizations

void foldGeneralizations(MessageType messageType,
                         CloneClass cloneClass)
                         throws LoaderException,
                                FactoryException,
                                XmlItsException
If the current class contains any associations with non-null choiceSet, traverses all associations of RIM type 'generalizes' and folds them into a single class. Only folds the current class, not classes linked to it.

Parameters:
messageType - message type containing folded clone classes
cloneClass - clone class to start from
Throws:
LoaderException - if loading CMETs on demand fails
FactoryException - if creating a folded class fails
XmlItsException - if consistency checks fail

foldGeneralizations

void foldGeneralizations(MessageType messageType)
                         throws LoaderException,
                                FactoryException,
                                XmlItsException
Folds all classes in a message type.

Parameters:
messageType - message type containing folded clone classes
Throws:
LoaderException - if loading CMETs on demand fails
FactoryException - if creating a folded class fails
XmlItsException - if consistency checks fail
